version_description:
Fixes black square bug affecting most devices
Added option in Settings to turn off the green glow of playable units.
Fix bug on the green glow showing the playable units.
Improved graphics with full HD version + many bug fixes.
Full High Definition version + dramatic improvement to battery usage + improved UNDO & controls.
Full High Definition version + dramatic improvement to battery usage + improved UNDO & controls.
First version of the Message Center. You can configure Push Notification associated with private message in your account notification settings.
Improved message center & made it easier to click on buttons.
Added new items in the Shop and fixed many bugs. WARNING: the offline mode is not working in 1.9.42 We will release an update ASAP with a fix.
Added new items in the Shop and fixed many bugs. Fixed crash when starting offline mode/campaign.
Do NOT update or install if you have iOS 10. The app crashes on launch. A fixed version will arrive in the next days.

Mostly bug fixes to Campaign, Replay.
Added ability to MUTE players in chat 
Check changes log on forum at http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/0/2650.page

Improved visual preview for MOVEMENT, ATTACK & ABILITIES.
http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/0/2655.page

New REEF, OCEAN, BRIDGE, CITY, ROAD & CHASM tiles + visual improvements.
More info at http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/2719.page

NEW TILES + many improvements, bug fixes
More info at http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/2736.page
more bugs fixes & performance/network improvements. See our forum for longer list of changes.
Bug fixes and improvements. More info: http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/2736.page

NEW UNITS are available for PRE-PURCHASE, Improved performance, Fixed network bug, Improved road/bridge connections in maps.
http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/0/2758.page

3 NEW UNITS are RELEASED: the BOPPER, the GUARDIAN and the BORFLY. The graphics are not the final ones and will be improved in the next updates. This update will become mandatory 1 week after it is released.
http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/2780.page

Better support for iPhone 7
Many bug fixes: attack preview was sometimes incorrect, Terms Of Service link was broken, ... 
Many visual improvements: BOPPER, BORFLY, tiles icons, Sapiens base, ... 
Improved War Report: base count now includes ALL bases including the ones owned at the start. 
Improved Player Profile: Friends, Team, Achievements, Maps, tournament rewards... 
Improved translations for several languages thanks to the dedicated community 
Game replay now shows the name of the Winner
Added simplified Chinese language and chat room.
Fixed bugs
Added 3 new amphibious units. WARNING: if it crashes, uninstall then reinstall to fix the issue.
Fix critical bugs.

* Fixed many bugs. 
* Added new audio for Mantisse, Salamander, Fuze, Bopper, Borfly and Guardian units. 
* Improved translations. 
* Improved tournament browsing by separating each year. 
* Added new end game effect and when opening a reward.
* Improved user interface for advanced players.

* Build any unit that you don't own with purchasable tokens or by watching an AD
* Undo turn available by watching an AD 
* Non-started game: Allow to any change of players: add, remove, replace, swap owner, ... 
* Create game: it is now possible to use existing/pre-made team 
* Tournament in which you are playing or waiting for the next round are now marked with a green play icon 
For more details: http://forum.uniwar.com/posts/list/2966.page

- Map details visible for the games before start.
- UI Improvements
- Bug fixes
* Custom tournaments

- New missions in Campaign mode
- New maps for local games. Enjoy Uniwar offline!
- iPhone X support
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- New missions in Campaign mode
- New maps for local games. Enjoy Uniwar offline!
- iPhone X support
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- New maps for local games. Enjoy Uniwar offline!

- New missions in Campaign mode
- New maps for local games. Enjoy Uniwar offline!
- iPhone X support
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- Added chat room for mapmakers
- Fixed freeze on iOS 12
* Custom tournaments

- UniWar Pro subscriptions
- Store items purchases with UniGems and UniCoins
- Improved early campaign missions
- Added solution for daily mission button to game screen.
- Bug fixes

- Map details visible for the games before start.
- UI Improvements
- Bug fixes

- New feature: Uniwar Notepad - allows replay renaming and personal notes/memos on other players/teams/games
- New feature for Pro account: Save and Restore Move
- Bug fixes

- Added Campaign rewards
- Bug fixes

- Improved public chat room
 - Fixed bug resulted some broken replays
 - New feature - Wormhole to another galaxy!
 - Wormholes are available also for coins or rewarded video ads
 - Simplified process of joining teams
 - Added public chat messages for finished game replays.
 - Public messages are linked to specific game action and are displayed as popup during replay.

- Slightly improved unit control buttons
- More convenient way of watching tournament replays
- Added support for new mission mode - Zombie!
- Even more bugs fixed!

- Added button to create teams easier
 - Fixed bug that disabled team editing for players.
 - Added settings option to enable Chess Grid in all games
 - Fixed Unsync error after loading game with uncommited actions
 - EndTurn button made visible when unit is selected
 - Fixed glitch exposed in Basement Run and other multi-bot SPC

- Added button to create teams easier
 - Added settings option to enable Chess Grid in all games
 - EndTurn button made visible when unit is selected
 - Bug fixes
Bug fixes
